author: newsr.in
title: Nintendo takes Pokémon into mobile gaming in partnership with Google Niantic
text: Nintendo is finally entering the mobile gaming market with the launch of a new Pokémon game in partnership with Google’s Niantic Labs location-based gaming division. The company said previously that it is creating five games for mobile in a variety of genres — at least according to partner Shintaro Asako of DeNA West. But nobody […] »
